lead_paragraph: The Orlando massacre turned a sanctuary of fantasy and escape into a sobering scene all too familiar in America.

byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson contributed reporting from New Orleans, and Nick Madigan from Orlando.

headline.print_headline: Realizing It’s a Small, Terrifying World After All
headline.main: Realizing It’s a Small, Terrifying World After All

snippet: The Orlando massacre turned a sanctuary of fantasy and escape into a sobering scene all too familiar in America.
abstract: Dan Barry This Land column argues Orlando, Fla, where violence like mass shooting at Pulse nightclub can flare up in shadow of strip malls and Disney resorts, virtually embodies diversity and paradoxes of American life.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Disney, Walt, World (Lake Buena Vista, Fla)
